website_summaries.verdict: A small palette that packs a big punch. Blend your own looks, or follow suggested pairs for an effortless, unforgettable look.
pros: Six neutral shades perfect for everyday wear
Clay-based, so they're extremely buildable and blendable
Flatters a wide variety of skin tones and eye colors
cons: Some users expected more pigmentation for the price and brand

customer_reviews.title: Best eye shadow to date
customer_reviews.text: After getting a few discounted Tarte products to try, Tarte is now my favorite make-up to date. Smooth application and rich color makes Tarte the choice that is hard to beat. Plus, this eye shadow does not cause my sensitive eyes to water - finally!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gatz

customer_reviews.title: No wort the time or money
customer_reviews.text: If u don’t mind sitting there and BUILDING up these colors ....Then I guess there ok
customer_reviews.author: frances berga

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Expensive!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors but that's about it. Way too expensive. This was my first Tarte purchase & will be my last. I've tried many eyeshadows over the years that are just as good or better for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Shaddows!!
customer_reviews.text: Such beautiful colors! The photos on here don’t do them justice! The center two colors are a light vilote color, and the far two colors on the right are rich plum! Sooo pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeshadow palette! I had the same one in the past, but lost it. It had lasted over two years even with me using it every day. Smells like chocolate. Colors are nice, and they blend easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel size fall TARTE - TEASE Eyeshadow Set
customer_reviews.text: Great long lasting colors of fall. Absolutely love it! Compact for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Brammer

customer_reviews.title: so nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review. I gave it four stars at first because i thought it was too expensive. But after using this for a while, i really love it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the palette however the colors in the photo do not look like what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: amazing coverage and very low fall out stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: timetraveler

customer_reviews.title: The colors are so pretty! I was really disappointed in the lack of ...
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so pretty! I was really disappointed in the lack of pigment and the large amount of fallout that these shadows create. Overall though, they smell really nice, are vegan, and easy to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Daissica

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty and good for the price. It is a very small palette.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: These are so pretty and so many variations
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty and so many variations. Something about the eyeshadow - such good quality. It does not flake off, crease, goes on so silky and not overpowering, stays on. Product arrived fast and well protected. Will use this for a long time. Exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real Tarte.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a genuine product. I still have a little bit left of my original pallet and there is no comparison in any capacity. This is definitely fake and you can tell in every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I usually like Tarte eyeshadows but this one was not matte. It had a bit of shine to it and I did not like the dark colors.
customer_reviews.author: SunSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Love the rich pigment of the shadows
customer_reviews.text: Love the rich pigment of the shadows. The colors are natural and flattering on everyone. The shadows apply smoothly. Wonderful smaller size of the naked shadows everyone loves these days.
customer_reviews.author: Product Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Incredible thick, luxurious eye shadow.
customer_reviews.text: It’s Tarte... one of the BEST products in the market. The thick, silky eye shadows last and last! I wouldn’t buy anything but this. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: No color transfer
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Tarte products including eyeshadow but this one has no pigment at all. There is no color transfer onto my skin. Very strange. Maybe I'll try a wet brush.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ciraulo

customer_reviews.title: Value and specific for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my handbag and just the necessary for freshening up as the day goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K.

customer_reviews.title: L💜ve
customer_reviews.text: Good product the only thing I was disappointed with is the size of it bc I thought it was bigger than this
customer_reviews.author: April Nolove Smith

customer_reviews.title: Was super excited to have this adorable palette but once opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to have this adorable palette but once opened it looked as if someone’s fingernail slipped in 2 shadows. I contacted the seller and they made it right!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The palette was very dirty with eyeshadow all over when I opened it. The quality is good but the shadows are so similar it's like I'm only getting 3 shades instead of 6.
customer_reviews.author: A.N.B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this palette for fall!! Colors blend very well and it's nice to carry in a purse!
customer_reviews.author: Kaytum

customer_reviews.title: odd texture.
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a dud, The consistency was different than the one I was gifted with a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Price

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and small
customer_reviews.text: I got this small pallet as a gift and it is my go-to. Lovely, neutral colors that are soft yet pigmented and go on/blend so smoothly. It is nice and small, so very portable, yet I have been using these shadows constantly (couple times a week for months now....) and they're still barely indented. Best part is that they smell like chocolate!!! What could be better than that?? I think the price is high for me, because I'm cheap, but they are very high quality and I adore them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Borkenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product... Cheaper at Sephora for once
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Nice everyday colors and a nice smooth formula. The scent is also great. I bought this for 16$ at Sephora though so id recommend purchasing it there.
customer_reviews.author: robynbear96

customer_reviews.title: Very pigmented and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to using makeup and this palette makes it easy to create daytime looks and even a Mir story evening look. It's been fun playing with the student shades, and it lasts all day with one application!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Barack

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeshadow pallatte
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye shadow palate. It's really small so it's great for travel. Neutral purple shadows are gorgous. Really brings out green eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great palette. Love all the shades, they are very pigmented
customer_reviews.author: Rayna Moon

product_meta.title: TARTE Tartelette Tease EYESHADOW PALETTE
product_meta.description: What it is formulated to do: Create amazing shadow looks with this clay- infused, pocket-perfect version of tartes bestselling Tartelette palette. It features four everyday matte shadows paired with two captivating lusters so you can refresh, define, and transition your eyes from day to evening. The flirty, flattering shades feature lid, crease, and highlight pairings so tartelettes can create modern, alluring looks without the guesswork. Powered by tartes signature Amazonian clay formula, these shadows offer the same pigmented payoff, blendability, and wear time as with the original tartelette palette, but in a chic, petite case.
feature_bullets: A perfectly petite everyday eyeshadow palette featuring six flirty shades
- 6 x 0.03 oz Eyeshadows in Whisper (light pink), Crush (taupe shimmer), Heartbreaker (brown), Wink
-Use your favorite eyeshadow brush to apply the mix of liner, lid, and crease shades, and create alluring, versatile looks that take you from day to play.
